connectTimeout.title: Connection timeout
connectTimeout.description: Timeout in ms to connect to the target

reconnectAttempts.title: Reconnect attempts
reconnectAttempts.description: How much we try connecting to the target, 0 means: no retry

reconnectInterval.title: Reconnect interval
reconnectInterval.description: Interval in ms between retries connecting to the target

banner.title: Idle timeout
banner.text: Maximum time a TCP connection will stay active if no data is received or sent in milliseconds. Once the timeout has elapsed, the unused connection will be closed, allowing to free the associated resources. Zero means no timeout.

readIdleTimeout.title: Read idle timeout (ms)
readIdleTimeout.description: This determines if a connection will timeout and be closed if no data is received within the timeout.

writeIdleTimeout.title: Write idle timeout (ms)
writeIdleTimeout.description: This determines if a connection will timeout and be closed if no data is sent within the timeout.
